data.description: wild card text snippets for text comparisons
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
At 02:44 AM 6/14/2003 +0200, Max Maischein wrote: A second thing
    that I would like you to reconsider is the naming of
    "Test::TestUtil" respectively "Test::Tech" - neither of those
    isdescriptive of what the routines actually do or what the module
    implements.

    Someparts (the "scrub" routines) might even better live in another
    module namespace, "Test::Util::ScrubData" or something like that.

    This is favorable response to Mr. Maischein suggestion and official
    withdraws the request to register the Test::TestUtil namespace
